alert.note: Alert for Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:06AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Union, Columbia, eastern Suwannee and Hamilton Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1006 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Obrien, or 8 miles west of Ichetucknee Spring, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Jasper, Jennings, White Springs, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Suwannee Springs, Columbia, Fort White and Worthington Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
